definition: a soft thin light fabric with a crinkled surface, to cover or drape with crape
details:
noun
- a soft thin light fabric with a crinkled surface
= synonyms: crape
- small very thin pancake
= synonyms: crape, French pancake
- paper with a crinkled texture
= synonyms: crepe paper
verb
- to cover or drape with crape
= synonyms: crape
